statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-5 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 4 \, x - 5 , 8 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x + 10 , -4 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 4 \, x - 5 , -38 \, x^{3} - 14 \, x^{2} - 29 \, x - 40 , -6 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
